content.en: Sensor alignment optimization: Researchers have developed algorithms to calibrate the positioning of cameras and LiDAR sensors in order to improve the accuracy of their measurements. These algorithms use techniques such as nonlinear least squares, planarity-constrained optimization, and point set registration to estimate the relative positions of the sensors. By optimizing the alignment between cameras and LiDAR sensors, these algorithms enhance the performance of systems that rely on both technologies, such as autonomous vehicles and robotics.
content.da: Optimering af sensorjustering: Forskere har udviklet algoritmer til at kalibrere placeringen af kameraer og LiDAR-sensorer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden af deres målinger. Disse algoritmer bruger teknikker som ikke-lineær mindste kvadrater, planaritetsbegrænset optimering og sætregistrering af punkter til at estimere sensorernes relative positioner. Ved at optimere justeringen mellem kameraer og LiDAR-sensorer forbedrer disse algoritmer ydeevnen for systemer, der er afhængige af begge teknologier, såsom autonome køretøjer og robotik.
